mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DIAGNOSIS(DANSNUM, USERNAME, DANSCATEGORY, DANSCONTENT, DOCTORNAME, DANSREQTIME, DANSSTATUS) VALUES (NULL, #{username}, #{dansCategory}, #{dansContent}, #{doctorName}, NOW(), 0)
mapper.select: SELECT D.*,U.NAME AS PATIENT FROM DIAGNOSIS D INNER JOIN USERS U ON D.USERNAME = U.USERNAME WHERE D.DOCTORNAME = #{username} AND D.DANSSTATUS = 0 ORDER BY D.DANSREQTIME ASC LIMIT #{startRow}, #{perPage}
SELECT COUNT(DANSNUM) FROM DIAGNOSIS D INNER JOIN USERS U ON (D.USERNAME = U.USERNAME) WHERE D.DOCTORNAME = #{username} AND D.DANSSTATUS = 1
